body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeffrey Ross and the customer's name is Elizabeth Perez.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jeffrey Ross, and I'm with MetaCar, your trusted car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Elizabeth! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit frustrated with my recent rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for any inconvenience you've faced. Can you please provide me with your booking number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could I also have your date of birth for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's March fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Elizabeth. Let me pull up your account to see what went wrong.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your patience, and I will do my best to resolve this for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Elizabeth. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out to us anytime!
